thread.title: Kerry to meet Netanyahu, Abbas on Palestinian-Israeli unrest this week - Region - World
thread.title_full: Kerry to meet Netanyahu, Abbas on Palestinian-Israeli unrest this week - Region - World - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Kerry to meet Netanyahu, Abbas on Palestinian-Israeli unrest this week - Region - World
text:
Related Armed Israeli settlers injure three during attack on Palestinian houses in El-Khalil city Israel claims thwarts further knife attacks, 3 Palestinians killed Kerry: Israeli action against Iran would be 'huge mistake': NBC US Secretary of State John Kerry said on Sunday he would meet Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in Germany this week, followed by talks with Palestinian leader Mahmoud Abbas after more than two weeks of unrest .
It is the first time Kerry has confirmed reports of a meeting with both Netanyahu and Abbas. He did not say where he planned to meet Abbas, saying only it would be in the Middle East.
He also said he would hold meetings on Syria while in Europe, but did not elaborate.
*This story was edited by Ahram Online.
